Type aliases

InitType

InitType: 1 | 0 | -1 | boolean | "1" | "0" | "x"
  • Defined in index.ts:140

Type for initialization values.

  • false, -1, '0' mean logical 0,
  • 0, 'x' mean undefined value,
  • true, 1, '1' mean logical 1.
